ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Assign me a helper from my family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And give me as assistant from my family
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and appoint for me, from my household, someone who will help me bear my burden -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Appoint a deputy (for me) from my own people.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And appoint for me a viceroy from among my family.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And appoint for me a helper from my family,"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And give to me an aider from my family:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Appoint for me of my folk a familiar,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Appoint for me a henchman from my folk,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and appoint for me a helper from among my family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And appoint for me a minister from my household.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Appoint for me a minister from my family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And give me a Minister from my family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And appoint for me a helper from my family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Appoint for me a minister from my family
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And appoint an assistant for me, from my family.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And appoint for me a minister from my family -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:29] And appoint for me a minister, an assistant for that [task], from my family,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Appoint for me a henchman from my folk) appoint for me a helper from my own people,
